InstructionData.Title: Base pressurizer
InstructionData.Author: RZR0
InstructionData.Instructions:
define hashGasSensor -1252983604 define hashDigitalValve -1280984102
define nameHashInternalGasSensor -1563929973 define nameHashInternalAirValve 2137338350
alias internalPressure r0
main: lbn internalPressure hashGasSensor nameHashInternalGasSensor Pressure Average blt internalPressure 103 openValve bgt internalPressure 105 closeValve j main
openValve: sbn hashDigitalValve nameHashInternalAirValve On 1 j main
closeValve: sbn hashDigitalValve nameHashInternalAirValve On 0 j main
